translations.english: He led troops west, and there was no city that did not surrender.

translations.chinese: 至丹水，高武侯鰓、襄侯王陵降。
translations.english: He reached Danshui. Lord Gaowu Gai and Lord Xiang Wang Ling surrendered.

translations.chinese: 還攻胡陽，遇番君別將梅鋗，與偕攻析、酈，皆降。
translations.english: Returning to attack Huyang, he encountered Fan Jun's separate general Mei Zhu, and together they attacked Xi and Li, all of which surrendered.

translations.chinese: 所 過毋得鹵掠，秦民喜。
translations.english: Wherever they passed, they did not plunder. The Qin people rejoiced.
He sent the Wei man Ning Chang as envoy to Qin.
